title: 42 of the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (No. 34 of 2017), being
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Public Service Pay and Pensions
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Public Service Pay and Pensions 
Act 2017 (Section 42) (Payments in Respect of Certain Services Rendered in 
Response to the Risk to Public Health Posed by Covid-19) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited public service pay pension act 2017 (section 42) (payments respect certain service rendered response risk public health posed covid-19) (amendment) regulation 2020

title: 42 of the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (No. 34 of 2017), being
heading: In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” mean the Public Service
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” mean the Public Service 
Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (Section 42) (Payments in Respect of Certain 
Services Rendered in Response to the Risk to Public Health Posed by Covid-19) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 101 of 2020).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean public service pay pension act 2017 (section 42) (payments respect certain service rendered response risk public health posed covid-19) regulation 2020 (s.i no 101 2020)

title: 42 of the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (No. 34 of 2017), being
heading: 3. Regulation 4 shall come into operation on the date of the making of these
text_raw:
3. Regulation 4 shall come into operation on the date of the making of these 

Regulations.
text_norm: 3 regulation 4 shall come operation date making regulation

title: 42 of the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (No. 34 of 2017), being
heading: 4. The amount of the payment specified in column (3) of Schedule 2 to the
text_raw:
4. The amount of the payment specified in column (3) of Schedule 2 to the 
Principal Regulations opposite reference number 2 in column (1) is amended by 
the substitution of “€13.88” for “€41.63”.
text_norm: 4 amount payment specified column (3) schedule 2 principal regulation opposite reference number 2 column (1) amended substitution eur13.88 eur41.63

title: 42 of the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (No. 34 of 2017), being
heading: 5. The Principal Regulations shall be revoked on the 10th day of August
text_raw: 5. The Principal Regulations shall be revoked on the 10th day of August
text_norm: 5 principal regulation shall revoked 10th day august

title: 42 of the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (No. 34 of 2017), being
heading: Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in
text_raw:
2020. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd June, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the foregoing 
Regulations. 

[220] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister 
 for Public Expenditure and Reform, 

18 June, 2020. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
 of the Minister for Health,, 

19 June, 2020. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [220]

title: 42 of the Public Service Pay and Pensions Act 2017 (No. 34 of 2017), being
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations shall apply to payments in respect of certain services rendered 
by a general practitioner to or on behalf of the HSE for patients affected by 
Covid-19. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [220] 5
